portfolio.title: Super Mario
portfolio.description: Super Mario Game project is a reimagining of the classic platformer,recreating its iconic gameplay mechanics and nostalgic elements with modern technology

portfolio.title: Mobile Ecommerce App
portfolio.description: Mobile E-commerce project focuses on creating a seamless and user-friendly shopping experience, allowing customers to manage their orders on-the-go.

portfolio.title: Easy Rentn
portfolio.description: A web scraping app designed to efficiently extract and collect data from websites, providing valuable insights and automating information retrieval for various purposes.
